responses: Hi there, how can I help?
I could navigate you to the places in RTC
I could offer you the procedures to be followed in the campus.

Write a leave letter with your particulars and destined to The Principal,Give the letter to your class Tutor/Advisor,get signed from your Tutor/Advisor,HOD staff and handover the letter to your Tutor.

patterns: How to write a permission letter?
Where to give the permission letter?
who should i meet to grant my permission letter?
responses: Write a permission letter with your particulars and destined to The Principal,Give the letter to your class Tutor/Advisor,get signed from your Tutor/Advisor,HOD staff and handover the letter to your Tutor.

patterns: What are the Rules & Regulations to be followed by a student?
what are the instructions to  be followed by a student?
responses: Rules/Instructions to be followed by a student - 1) All students must wear their identity card and should come by proper uniform. 2)Boys should come by neat formals and Girls should come by neat chuditars. 3)Students should wear neat formal shoes (black/brown). 4)Boys should maintain neat hair cut with a clean shave. 5) All students should be in their respective classes before 9 AM.6) Mobile Phones are to be maintained in switch-off mode within the block.
